Package net.jordaria

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    The settings and configurations for various parts of the program This is so changes across the entire game can be made quickly and easily with minimal recompiling.
    FileIO
    Controls file input and output.
    GameSettings
    Settings for use in the game.
    Heart
    A thread that constantly fires tick events.
    Jordaria
    The entry point of the program, containing subsystems and data.
    KeyBind
    Key bindings which handle state of pressed and time pressed.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AsciiValue
    An enum of ascii characters and their integer value.
